text: Quattro bravi ragazzi ("Four Fine Boys") is a 1993 Italian crime-drama film written and directed by Claudio Camarca. The film was screened in the Venetian Nights section at the 50th Venice International Film Festival. == Cast == * Matteo Chioatto as René Cordaro * Patrizio Fumagalli as Marco * Riccardo Salerno as Giorgio Molteni * Lorenzo Bianchi as Davide Chiarelli * Michele Placido as "Marcione" * Tony Sperandeo as Prof. Franchini * Luigi Maria Burruano as René's Father * Giancarlo Dettori as Giorgio's Father * Nicola Pistoia as Vincenzo Sellani * Violante Placido as Valeria ==See also == * List of Italian films of 1993 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 films Category:Italian films Category:Italian crime drama films Category:1993 crime drama films Category:1993 directorial debut films Category:1993 drama films
title: Quattro bravi ragazzi
